name: Indian Institute of Technology Bhubaneswar
overview: A second-generation IIT established in 2008, operating from a sprawling permanent campus at the foot of Barunei Hill. It focuses on core engineering, climate science, and minerals.

name: National Institute of Technology Rourkela
overview: One of the premier NITs in India, consistently ranked among the top engineering institutes. It offers a wide range of specialized courses including Ceramics and Food Process Engineering.

name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences Bhubaneswar
overview: An apex healthcare institute established under the PMSSY. It is one of the most sought-after AIIMS outside New Delhi.

name: Indian Institute of Management Sambalpur
overview: A third-generation IIM operating from its permanent campus in Basantpur. It focuses on innovation and entrepreneurship.

name: National Institute of Science Education and Research
overview: An autonomous institute under the Department of Atomic Energy (DAE), affiliated with HBNI. Known for high-quality basic sciences education.

name: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Berhampur
overview: One of the newest IISERs, dedicated to scientific research and science education.

name: Central University of Odisha
overview: Established to promote higher education in the tribal-dominated KBK region. It offers various postgraduate and research programs.

name: Utkal University
overview: The oldest university in Odisha and the 17th oldest in India. It is a premier affiliating university located at Vani Vihar.

name: Ravenshaw University
overview: Formerly the prestigious Ravenshaw College, it was upgraded to a unitary university. It is a historic institution in East India.

name: Sambalpur University
overview: Located at Jyoti Vihar, Burla, it serves the higher education needs of Western Odisha.

name: Berhampur University
overview: The oldest university in Southern Odisha, affiliating colleges in Ganjam, Gajapati, and Kandhamal districts.

name: Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology
overview: A premier private deemed university and Institute of Eminence (IoE), known for its massive campus and diverse professional programs.

name: Siksha 'O' Anusandhan
overview: A major private deemed university in Bhubaneswar, comprising ITER (Engineering) and IMS (Medical). Consistently ranked high in NIRF.

name: Veer Surendra Sai University of Technology
overview: Formerly UCE Burla, it is the oldest government engineering college in Odisha, now a unitary state university. Known for its strong alumni network.

name: Odisha University of Technology and Research
overview: Formerly College of Engineering and Technology (CET), Bhubaneswar. It was upgraded to a unitary university in 2021. It is a top choice for engineering aspirants in Odisha.

name: Odisha University of Agriculture and Technology
overview: The second oldest agricultural university in India. It offers education in agriculture, horticulture, veterinary science, and agricultural engineering.

name: National Law University Odisha
overview: A premier National Law University established by the NLUO Act of 2008. It focuses on legal education and research.

name: Srirama Chandra Bhanja Medical College and Hospital
overview: The oldest and premier government medical college in Odisha, attracting the top rankers of the state.

name: Maharaja Krishna Chandra Gajapati Medical College
overview: A major government medical college and hospital serving Southern Odisha.

name: Veer Surendra Sai Institute of Medical Sciences and Research
overview: A premier government medical college and hospital serving Western Odisha.

name: International Institute of Information Technology Bhubaneswar
overview: Established by the Govt of Odisha and converted to a unitary university. It focuses on IT and related fields.

name: Centurion University of Technology and Management
overview: The first private state university in Odisha, known for its focus on skill development and vocational education.

name: XIM University
overview: Known primarily for Xavier Institute of Management Bhubaneswar (XIMB), it is a top-tier private Jesuit university offering management and liberal arts programs.

name: Biju Patnaik University of Technology
overview: The state affiliating university for technical education. Most private engineering and pharmacy colleges in Odisha are affiliated with BPUT.

name: Vikram Deb University
overview: Formerly Vikram Deb Autonomous College, recently upgraded to a university. It is a key institution in the KBK region.

name: Dharanidhar University
overview: Formerly Dharanidhar Autonomous College, upgraded to a university to serve the mineral-rich district of Keonjhar.

name: Buxi Jagabandhu Bidyadhar Autonomous College
overview: One of the most prestigious autonomous colleges in Odisha, known for its high cutoffs and academic environment.

name: Silicon University
overview: Formerly Silicon Institute of Technology, it was one of the top private engineering colleges in Odisha, now upgraded to a private university.

name: C.V. Raman Global University
overview: Formerly C.V. Raman College of Engineering, now a private university. Known for its focus on marine engineering and skills.

name: NIST University
overview: Formerly National Institute of Science and Technology, it is a leading private engineering institution in Southern Odisha, now a university.
